item.title: Convert My Recipe into Tidyverse Pipeline
item.description: The Pipeline Pipe operators and Tidyverse packages have greatly improved my happiness level of writing and reading R code in data tidying, transformation, and visualization. Before, I always found myself writing long code with one function embedded into another function and another, something like h(g(f(x))) but way more complicated, or creating a lot of meaningless intermediate datasets like tmp1 and tmp2. The pipe along with Tidyverse packages makes the code much more readable.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Meinizi Zheng. I am an Associate Consultant at Axtria - Ingenious Insights. I earned my master degree from the Department of Statistics and Biostatistics, Rutgers University. You can find more about my academic and professional experience on my LinkedIn page. This site is mainly for posts of statistics, machine learning and data visualization using R, along with my random thoughts here and there. I love music and nature.
